name: Lunge, Mythic

sections.text: Whenever you use Lunge and hit a creature with the melee attack, you no longer take a –2 penalty to AC against that creature. You can expend one use of mythic power when you use Lunge to negate the –2 penalty to AC whether you hit or miss, and gain a +2 bonus on attacks of opportunity you make while Lunge is in effect.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your reaching strikes aid your defenses against those you hit.
